Houston.KAMA-FM: KAMA-FM (104.9 FM, "104.9 y 93.3 Latino Mix") is a Spanish CHR radio station serving the Houston, Texas, United States, area. The Univision-owned station is licensed to Deer Park, Texas, and is a class C2 FM (equivalent to 50,000 watts at 500 feet). The transmitter is located on the historic (1948) KNUZ tower, along with sister station KLTN, at 315 N. Ennis Street in the East End.
